a class of dynamic memory allocation algorithmsanew dynamic memory allocation algorithm thefibonacci system is introduced this algorithm is similar to but seems to have certain advantages over,the buddy system a generalization is mentioned which includes both of these systems as special cases.cacm october 1973hirschberg d s.dynamic storage allocation buddy system,simulation fibonacci fragmentation3.89 4.32 4.39ca731005 jb january 20 1978 11:38 am1389 4 24351552 4 24352162 4 24352435 4 24352596 4 24352768 4 24352845 4 24352902 4 24352955 4 24351184 5 24352435 5 24352435 5 24352435 5 24352596 5 24352747 5 24352768 5 24352845 5 24352902 5 24352911 5 24352955 5 24351051 6 24351062 6 24351184 6 24351184 6 24351184 6 24351184 6 24351184 6 24351211 6 24351552 6 24351879 6 24351879 6 24351879 6 2435273 6 24352435 6 24352435 6 24352435 6 24352435 6 24352435 6 24352435 6 24352435 6 24352498 6 24352596 6 24352596 6 24352598 6 24352734 6 24352734 6 24352736 6 24352747 6 24352747 6 24352747 6 24352768 6 24352768 6 24352773 6 24352773 6 24352983 6 2435
